resources.endpointUrlHelp: Path to the email submission endpoint. (Param: $EMAIL_ADDRESS)
resources.widgetBackgroundColourHelp: Background colour for the widget. Hex or colour name value (e.g. #000 or black)
resources.titleColourHelp: Colour for the main title on the email sign up widget. Hex or colour name value (e.g. #000 or black)
resources.isCompactVersionHelp: Determines if the widget will be stretched out or not for Desktop
resources.descriptionColourHelp: Colour for the description text on the email sign up widget. Hex or colour name value (e.g. #000 or black)
